    Since:
    0.2.7

    Output json log to graylog through GELF UDP docker protocol

    Author:
    Valentin Burgaud (Xharos), <xharos@islandswars.fr> Created the 05/01/2018 at 14:35

    • Method Detail

      • createCustomLog

        default <T extends Log> T createCustomLog​(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                          java.util.logging.Level level,
                                          java.lang.String message)
        Instanciate and retrieve a custom log, or else throw Exception if reflection failed
        Type Parameters:
        T - log type
        Parameters:
        clazz - a custom class to instanciate
        level - a log level
        message - a log message
        Returns:
        a custom Log implementation
        See Also:
        NMSReflectionUtil.getConstructorAccessor(String, Class[])

      • createDefaultLog

        default void createDefaultLog​(java.lang.String message)
        Create a default log with INFO level and a custom message
        Parameters:
        message - a message to log
        See Also:
        createDefaultLog(Level, String)

      • createDefaultLog

        default void createDefaultLog​(java.util.logging.Level level,
                              java.lang.String msg)
        Helper method to create and directly log a simple log
        Parameters:
        level - a log level
        msg - a log message

      • log

        void log​(Log object)
        Send this message to default docker sysout
        Parameters:
        object - an object to log, it will be serialize to json and sent to graylog through GELF

      • logError
